website_summaries.verdict: With so many storage options, durable construction, and a rainbow of attractive designs to choose from, there is a Foundation Backpack to fit everyone’s needs.
pros: Sports 2 large interior compartments and 4 zippered outer pockets
Pair of mesh water bottle pockets
cons: Only available in a single size

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome! Big!
customer_reviews.text: We just got it today but I’m very pleased with it. Look great and is big, my daughter likes to put her lunchbox inside the backpack and in winter she carries her snow pants inside the backpack as well. This backpack will fit all the everyday things plus lots of extras. Really great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best book bag i could have purchased for my middle ...
customer_reviews.text: Best book bag i could have purchased for my middle schooler! She loves it. High quality great size to fit everything she needs including extra sweater... Price is about what i would expect this quality to be. UPDATE: 8/2019 still in great usable condition. Washed it in the washer and hung it to dry.
customer_reviews.author: WorkingMommyof4

customer_reviews.title: and It was in perfect condition, great for kids in High School (probably ...
customer_reviews.text: Package came 2 days before expected delivery! Got it, opened the box. and It was in perfect condition, great for kids in High School (probably college too!) its roomy for my big binder/ flex file! Great Bag! Even has a laptop pocket on the main pocket! Also love how the pockets are laid out, they aren't all over the place! I recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Corey C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & awesome color combo!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 7th grade daughter. She loves the color and all the compartments. Great quality and love the lifetime warranty! I was worried it would get dirty pretty quickly, but it’s a nice mixture of both white and gray, so I am no too worried after seeing the bag in person. It’s auper cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: JorP

customer_reviews.title: Big!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I'm not a pink person but for some reason this bag caught my eye and I'm glad I bought it, it's awesome and a nice heavy material to hold my very big science books as well as lab books and small laptop. I would recommend this, and I love Adidas!
customer_reviews.author: Imani

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is great! I had been looking for a good backpack ...
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great! I had been looking for a good backpack that wouldn't hurt my back if I put a lot of things in it. I had been using jansport backpacks for a long time but the straps hurt and the sections in the back pack was too big so everything would fall to the bottom. This Adidas backpack is great! The pockets are small enough to not have everything fall to the bottom of the bag but large enough to fit everything I need. The carribeaner hook is also a nice touch and a place to hook my water bottle/lunch bag. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: msnook

customer_reviews.title: it's even better in real life!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute bag. I was a little unsure of the colors when I ordered it, but the colors are extremely nice. The cute coral pops from the very pretty minty green color, and it really stands out from the endless sea of generic backpacks in the high school hallway! This was purchased for my teen, but I would gladly use it as an adult. The quality is great too.
customer_reviews.author: simms

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The order came earlier than expected and I absolutely love the backpack. I use it for school and for my gym items. it's perfect. A lot of space and very convenient. I was worried about the color being too bright, but it isn't at all.
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Very good for working dental assistant
customer_reviews.text: Using this for work I am in the dental field and we have to have a change of clothes and shoes to wear home from work. I must be able to keep the dirty separate from the clean. This has two separate areas with zippers. And in the last section there us an inside pocket perfect for the shoes. I wear a 10 and they fit perfectly. I like that to so the shoes aren't sitting directly on top of clothes. Then it has the little pockets in the front for other stuff. This bookbag will be easy to keep contamination under control.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time purchasing an Adidas backpack and after purchasing this one in don't think I'll buy another brand again. I bought this for my daughter in highschool and it's great. There amount of space exceeds my expectations. She can fit all her books and sports uniforms in it and still has plenty of room. It has a small pocket that can be used to hold a celll phone, money or small personal products. There are side pockets to hold drinks so no worries about something spilling inside the bag. The straps are very well paaded so no sore shoulders. The overall structure of the bag is very durable. This bag is definitely worth the money paid.
customer_reviews.author: melinda cochran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for my 12 year old son who has ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag for my 12 year old son who has Down syndrome. The zippers are big enough for him to use even with his dexterity issues. Also the compartments are easy for him to see. Lastly this is a very sturdy backpack that still looks brand new despite how extremely rough my son is on it! He also gets lots of compliments on how cool it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter a 6th grader likes the back pack. light and packable. We did not have it long enough yet to attest to the sturdiness and durability. It looks well made so I hope it will in fact last. The only one negative I see is that it is not deep enough. in addition to her school books she needs to pack her lunch bag and sleeved Chromebook. and a water bottle on top. with all that we are struggling to close the bag most of the time. Yes, it is a lot, I won't deny. But she's one of those that has a tendency to loose things, therefore I need bag deep enough to put everything inside.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, holds up
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! Well worth it!! It holds her 2” binder jam packed, her chrome book, flute, and lunch bag without over jamming or struggling to zip. I was a little hesitant on the price thinking it was more for the name. But last year I had to buy two backpacks four months into the school year so I figured, $20 each I might as well try a $40 bag. It has taken her abused throwing it around, being full, and has not yet ripped, frayed, or torn anywhere and the school year is half over. Would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: The material is very thin. The first day of school, I picked up my daughter and both straps were ripping away from backpack. In the past, I have purchased generic backpacks for 1/2 of what I paid for this one at Walmart and they have made it through at least that middle of the school year. This was a huge disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Good for storage. Daughter absolutely loves it. Already has it monogrammed. (:
customer_reviews.author: Nick R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for High School students
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my daughter for school this year she is a sophomore in high school it is very sturdy and holds all her notebooks, folders, binders and her pencils and pens.. She's very happy with it I'm happy that it seems sturdy enough to last the whole school year!!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Dye

customer_reviews.title: It’s just a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Its clearly well made, a great color, and when not completely filled it doesn’t appear like there is extra room. Rather than the extra baggy appearance of some bags meant to be spacious that are not being used to full potential, it keeps its shape and smooth exterior with its thicker fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for middle schooler
customer_reviews.text: 1/2 way through 6th grade and so far so good. This is holding up well and doesn’t seem frayed or have any rips. My son says it’s comfortable. It holds a lot of materials.
customer_reviews.author: KE053

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coloring
customer_reviews.text: My daughters backpack broke right at the end of school year so I had to order this one. So far very good the tags said it had a lifetime warranty in case something breaks on it so very pleased and will be ordering my other daughter one too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Back To School In Style
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this bag. He has no issues with it and its really durable. These days books have become heavier from the time I was in school. You def wont regret getting this bag. I recommend it to any parent. Or to anyone who wants to get this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob L.

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: So far one month into the school year and it is holding up well. Spacious, attractive and very functional. will buy again if it holds up for even one entire semester. The colors are exactly as shown also. That doesn't always happen. Middke School now and it is strong enough to carry all binders for all 6 periods.
customer_reviews.author: Tcsmith38

customer_reviews.title: Picked a Winner
customer_reviews.text: My son likes what he likes and he likes this. It holds more to than his previous no name backpack, so he's happy. Since my community is not safe right now, I like that I didn't have to leave home to purchase this for him.
customer_reviews.author: laraf123

customer_reviews.title: Tough, held up to repeated use for 2 years beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable backpack. My daughter used it for 2 years at school and for it to last that long is impressive. It took abuse and held up beautifully! It could still be used but she just wanted another color so we bought another Adidas!
customer_reviews.author: S. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Takes the weight off of me!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this backpack. It has so many places to put things to keep yourself organized. My previous backpack was about 10 years old & was so heavy on my back. I transferred everything from it to this new backpack & couldn't believe the difference it made.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her sophomore year. So far it seems to be holding up very well. She loves it and it holds everything she needs it to. It helps that it is light to begin with because she's carrying a lot of stuff this year.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the out come of this bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because it seems solid for my son and in less than a month it's broken. Not please at all cause we come to purchase things of quality to have some sort of durability but sadly it's not the case. I think in cases like this it should be look into. Because a sastified customer is one that will continually do business with a honest supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Teen Daughter Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a book bag that would help my Teen Daughter as she heads back to school and came across this Adidas bag read the reviews and said what the heck let's see what they say is the truth... Well she got it yesterday and fell in LOVE with it.. I will be back within three to six months to give you guy's a update on the Adidas Bag...
customer_reviews.author: Meme09!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carry-on
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag to use as a carry-on for a six-day overseas trip, and it worked beautifully, even in rainy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Adidas is great.
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is even brighter and prettier in person! Ample room for storage and lots of pockets. I ordered this as a backpack for the gym, but it's so nice that I'm considering using it for school. I just want to show it off!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Perez Rios

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space
customer_reviews.text: This bag is big; Lots of pockets and storage. The main pocket fits notebook in it very easily. This was bought for a 10year old. We’re 3 weeks into school and it still looks new (and this kid can distroy some stuff.) It’s also light weight.
customer_reviews.author: mcf16

customer_reviews.title: Color is off
customer_reviews.text: Nice back pack however the color is definitely different in person. I bought this for my daughter for Christmas & the blue is way darker then pictured. I’m hoping if she doesn’t like it we can return it and get a different one elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: g.e.b

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for my daughters new school backpack and we love it. It’s large and roomy, a gorgeous color in person and is comfortable to wear. No problems. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is perfect for my busy student life! It has all kinds of compartments which makes it easy to organize my things by class, I love that there’s a bottle holder on each side, and I can fit all my books, notebooks, utensils, stethoscope, and other nursing stuff and still have room for snacks lol. Awesome purchase! 10/10 would buy again :D
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: great price and great backpack
customer_reviews.text: i love everything about this product. the straps are comfortable and can be adjusted easily. i also enjoy the amount of pockets on the backpack to keep my stuff organized. there’s also two water bottle holders which is very nice since my last few packets did not have any. the zippers are nicely made as well. definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: cindy hallstrom

customer_reviews.title: Well built and well executed.
customer_reviews.text: This is my full time backpack. Goes to work with me every time. Side mesh pockets will hold a 32 oz tumbler with no issue. Plenty of separate storage compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, durable, good-looking
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy bag with a lifetime warranty. Bought it for my new high schooler and it fits all of her stuff including her school-issued 15" laptop without a problem. The straps are comfortable and it's a fashionable design.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Love

customer_reviews.title: Amazing backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable and fits a ton of books, binders, notebooks, etc. Very comfortable on the shoulders and back and is quite light compared to other backpacks. Great color and very spacious. Lots of zipper compartments and quite large side pockets, which is a plus! Extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Firoved

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! It has a lot of storage but also is very lightweight. It’s durable and looks sleek. Only thing I would’ve liked is a back support so it stayed flat on the back. Other than that, great backpack especially because it’s inexpensive
customer_reviews.author: Devin B.

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for my teenage son at the beginning of the school year. He is not hard on backpacks at all and can usually keep the same one for a few consecutive years before needing to buy another. This backpack didn't make it through the first quarter of this school year. The laptop pocket inside came unraveled at the bottom and there are two quarter sized holes forming in the bottom of the backpack. The return period has lapsed, so, I guess we are just out $50. I would not recommend this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My son picked this one out to start his 7th grade year, it seems well made and stylish - he's excited to show it off to his middle school friends!
customer_reviews.author: John Adams

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Durable, lightweight and holds up like no other. My 7th grader has had this almost all school year the dang thing looks brand new still!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: Durable, spacious and practical.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable, my son has the same one and it’s going on three years of use. Spacious. Zippers don’t get stuck, ever!
customer_reviews.author: MPolar

customer_reviews.title: Love ADIDAS backpacks!!!
customer_reviews.text: Something about Adidas backpacks...love them!!! Seriously, when it comes to backpacks they are pretty much all the same, but love the quality and color selection.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Mordvinov

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I am using it as a tennis bag, and it works well for 2 rackets and assorted stuff. Mesh compartments on outside perfect for a can of tennis balls and/or a water bottle. Smaller zipper compartments for keys, glasses, etc. Light weight but substantial enough that I don't think it will wear out too fast.
customer_reviews.author: DE buyer

customer_reviews.title: Strong bag but color is too flashy in real.
customer_reviews.text: The color of the product displayed is not exactly this dark. It looks a bit feminine than unisex. Overall it is a good flashy bag with good strength.
customer_reviews.author: Aefaaz Ali Siddique

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack
customer_reviews.text: Nice but more expensive then the store. I saw it a week after I bought it on Amazon for $25 so I was a little taken aback about that much of a price gap but it is a good backpack
customer_reviews.author: Renee Restivo

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Stylish Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my sister. Nice colors and very lightweight. She loves it because it's not too bulky and is perfect for school and traveling with her team. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Toria

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this backpack for a few semesters now and I love it! I got such a great deal on this backpack, for under $20 I wasn’t expecting much but it’s perfect! Depending on the day determines how light or heavy my book load is, regardless this backpack has held up wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Marie

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product 5 ☆'s
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought this for our upcoming 7th grader this year. Size is great has so much room and compartments, durability is awesome if you are a parent and al l that random stuff even for the teacher for open house fit perfect, comfortability the straps were very wide and had had great cushions for the shoulders. Overall we are very pleased and 12 yr old daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for this backpack very much!!! ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for this backpack very much!!!! This backpack has lots of pockets and very helpful.Thank you very much for the backpack! To: UPS store From: Nicole Rother
customer_reviews.author: cageyphoto

customer_reviews.title: Great gym bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this back pack. It has lots of compartments!! I keep my lifters, weight belt, knee sleeves etc in one of the large comparents and my clean gym clothes in the other. I hated storing them together. I love that it has a place for water and my protein shake. It’s sturdy and super cute too. My friend got a Reebok crossfit backpack, and this one is just as nice but 1/3 of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Luvmyskin

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. Just what you'd expect. This is a light purple though. It isn't gray as it looks. Definitely a feminine color in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: CaSandra Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love the backpack. It holds a lot more than I thought it would. It is lightweight until you pack it full.
customer_reviews.author: Aelsb22

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality backpack! Got for my 8th grade daughter. Love the color and the price was cheaper than the same backpack at department stores! She can definitely use this for years to come, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: We have had this backpack for 6 months now. It is holding up nice. 4th grader packs it full with books/lunchbox ect. Lots of room and pockets. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: carrie nichols

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this backpack. She’s a freshman and so it really went above and beyond our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Umphlett

customer_reviews.title: My brother loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is the perfect size for my brother who is a sophomore in highschool. It is a little light weight, but well made. Great quality for the price. Should last him a year or two, maybe more.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable, and a lot of room. Perfect for college
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute and there's so much room. Only had it a few months but I use it everyday for school and am constantly carrying around a bunch of heavy textbooks, and so far it's very durable and does not stain easily even though I've spilled coffee on it too many times to count.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack as described
customer_reviews.text: I really like this backpack, even though it was a little bigger than I expected. Everything is as described the only thing is that it’s interior could have been designed better. It has a lot of room but not enough for small objects.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Jury out
customer_reviews.text: My kid likes this but like all back packs it needs to pass the zipper test Will see if it lasts at the end of the year
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for older kids.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this backpack, kind of big for a 4th grader. I feel as if it is slightly heavy for her, but would be great for a Jr High, High school student.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Olvera

customer_reviews.title: light weight
customer_reviews.text: My old book bag was all broken up. decided to buy her an more efficient one with a nice touch of color and style . my duagter loved this new Adidas bag, she said it even feel lighter on her back then with her old bag which had the same amount of books.
customer_reviews.author: Pary

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic backpack
customer_reviews.text: This pack is awesome. It has a lot of pockets and large space to fit in a lot of items. There are a lot of color choices as well. The light blue i bought is a great color. The pack has additional material on the bottom for extra durability. This is the best pack of this type I have ever owned. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M Adelman

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It was nice quality but the color was not what I expected. The pink is more of a hot pink instead of a coral.
customer_reviews.author: AlyssaSwanson

customer_reviews.title: very nice!
customer_reviews.text: not to big, holds alot, nice color(green) and my daughter thinks its confy!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Large backpack
customer_reviews.text: Back pack is huge!! Perfect for binders and the chrome book my daughter needs.
customer_reviews.author: AGomez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for high school
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this backpack to use for high school and it’s great! I currently have 2 binders and three notebooks in there along with a laptop and extra room for a lunchbox. Great quality with enough small and large pockets. Love the colors and the straps are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: We have three of these bags. They not only hold a lot but they are very sturdy. Woukd definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: coleallensmom

customer_reviews.title: I love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect color and it arrived just on time...also I love all the pockets and room..
customer_reviews.author: jason barber

customer_reviews.title: Well made backpack
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my teen son and it is a nice versatile backpack. Has plenty of pockets. Good color and well made. Large enough for all his school stuff and looks good as it is not too small looking.
customer_reviews.author: Guard Dog

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and larger than most!
customer_reviews.text: It's holding up very well since it's a very strong material. My 14 yr old granddaughter has it packed heavy between her books, 13 inch computer and everything else! the print is vivid, the zippers work great and it holds a lot! I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: This bookbag comes with a lifetime warranty. it is a good size and not very expensive
customer_reviews.author: Parts

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: So far this backpack has held up well for my youngest child which is saying a lot. That child is a hot mess and leaves chaos wherever he goes! Hopefully it will last a few years for him. The price was great so I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have two in our house. One survived a year of middle school. One was the perfect carry-all for a class trip to Washington D.C. Lightweight on its own but holds an incredible amount of gear. Very durable and comfortable to carry. Nice big mesh pockets on the sides for water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Torkeefan

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack, lots of pockets.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this backpack. The original one did have a broken zipper, luckily she checked all the zippers before she used it for school, but Amazon was great about sending us a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!! Adidas backpacks are always good quality and this one is no exception. It is light colored so it has gotten a little dirty, but came out of the washing machine good as new. There is plenty of space for books, Chrome books, lunch pails, and even the oversized binder can be crammed in there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I returned this bag but it's a good bag
customer_reviews.text: I returned the bag because it was to big for me. I'm 5'7'' . Too bad because the bag is good looking and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: SethFX

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy considering the amount of stuff my son has packed in it
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very nice good quality backpack
customer_reviews.text: Very nice high quality backpack. Perfect for my 3rd grader who's going back to school this month. I would definitely recommend this for any grade level.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality book bag. Colors are as expected. Holds quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: SomeAmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: so far this has held up nicely for half the year would recommend durable and nice looking backpack this is being used junior year so their books are heavy and laptop also.
customer_reviews.author: tm24

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great back pack exactly what I was expecting for my granddaughter whom is In the 5th grade
customer_reviews.author: NATALIE HAYWOOD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Perfect size for my 11 year old daughter & very strong zipper and straps!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strap is falling apart!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I was disappointed with this purchase. The strap on my backpack is ripping at the seam and I've only been using it since August. I do not fill my backpack super heavy, or only wear it with one strap so I don't understand why it is falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 7th grader and the locker full of books she has to carry.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a month amazing no rips or any damage if though i throw it around a lot at school. Only thing i have to say it when you leave it on the ground it gets dirty really quickly but other then that totally would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Redwan Rashid

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for college
customer_reviews.text: So cute works for heavy college books. Padded shoulder straps are comfortable. Lots of pockets. PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for my kid. Can fit in all she wants! Has been using it for half the school year, still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: It is a very neon pink and I love the color. There are a lot of different pockets on it so it's easy to stay organized. The laptop sleeve does not fit my HP Zbook 15, so I just put my planner in it instead. The backpack holds at least 4 binders plus extra. Lots of room and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Gaudynski

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: so far this bag has been pefect for my first semester in nursing school. It has alot of space and is very durable,
customer_reviews.author: Satome

customer_reviews.title: Durable and nice colors
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this for school. Colors are vibrant and great quality. It’s durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tristans

customer_reviews.title: A bit bigger than expected but otherwise a lovely bag
customer_reviews.text: A bit bigger than expected. Good quality. Colour and look as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: CandsFreeman

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great school backpack! Held up very well throughout the school year.
customer_reviews.author: Ducky

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Good durable bag plenty of room for all the stuff kids Carry these days..
customer_reviews.author: sheila chitwood

customer_reviews.title: Durable, colorful backpack
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this backpack. It has a lot of pockets to help keep her organized. The padded area for a laptop is really helpful as well. Great design, beautiful colors and durable materials. All around a perfect backpack that should last her several years.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof and rips easily
customer_reviews.text: If this bag really is an adidas it is poorly made. I’m a college student and carry lots of weight in my backpack usually. This bag’s straps started ripping after a week. Also it is definitely not waterproof. Walking to class in the rain and my backpack costing me a laptop isn’t what I’d call great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, functional & cool!
customer_reviews.text: Rugged yet good looking. Roomy too! Very pleased with this backpack for carrying my ridiculously heavy school books.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Have had this backpack for over a year, still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful backpack
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful back back. Super roomy and I get compliments on it all the time. I use it for all my work stuff and it’s very organized and durable.
customer_reviews.author: todye407

customer_reviews.title: Great back pack
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors, the pink just has a little pop, although I wish it was purple instead. There is alot of room and pockets, so far its holding up and looking great!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

product_meta.title: adidas Foundation Backpack
product_meta.description: This backpack goes from class to practice without missing a beat. zippered pockets inside and out offer smart organization, while an interior laptop sleeve protects electronics. the padded shoulder straps and back panel offer carrying comfort.
feature_bullets: Gently wash by hand. Do not bleach. Line dry
9 outside zippered pockets, internal zippered organization pockets, and a computer sleeve so you're school ready
Large size built with durable material built to stand up to wear and tear
Padded shoulder straps and padded back panel for total comfort
